items.title: Ironwood Pharmaceuticals’ 2026 Guidance Shock Sparks a Major Re-Rating
items.description: Ironwood Pharmaceuticals rose 30% after a strategic price cut on Linzess unlocked higher revenue guidance and surprised Wall Street analysts.

items.title: Starbucks’ Turnaround Makes a Strong Case for Long-Term Hold
